ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia knew that Magmatron and cybershark were still together, his babies told him so, he saw the touch of the hand. What the pit are they doing? He wondered,

Phobia knew that Magmatron and cybershark were still together, his 
babies told him so, he saw the touch of the hand."What the pit are 
they doing?"He wondered, "It seems to be some form of nonverbal 
communication. 

The spider knew that Magmatron figured out his little scheme, now why 
wasn't he putting an end to it?

All Phobia could do was wait.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron:: 
> 
>     Magmatron put his hand to his own head and then to CyberShark's 
head, 
> unknown to all he inserted a data track. It held information for 
this very 
> thing. (The spiders couldn't have known because it was made in 
Magmatron's 
> head.   
> "I have known of these creatures since they entered my base. I am 
aware of 
> every molecule of this ship, nothing goes on without my knowing 
it." The Data 
> track read. "Go about business as usual. If any more of those bugs 
show up, 
> treat them as common insects, not as robots."
>     "Have you told anybody else this?" Magmatron asked.
>     "No, I thought you should know first," CyberShark said.
>     "Good, nobody else needs to be bothered with a simple 
infestation. I 
> wouldn't worry about the bugs CyberShark, they are of no threat to 
us, just 
> harmless spiders really." Magmatron hit a sour note with the 
word 'spiders'.
